name: DronSpace
description:
DronSpace it's a futuristic 2D shooter game with only boss battles.

The player have guns and drones with diferents characteristics.

Each boss have three difficulty levels: Normal- Hard- Indronible(Very Hard).
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

A-move left

D-move right

W-Jump(press at the air to jump again)

S-Slide

Q-longer distance view

Left Shift(hold)- Run(use at the air to Aerial Impulse)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Follow me to current games log: https://twitter.com/MyGamesStudios1
